name: Aiso
detailed_description:
Special notice

《Karo》This is the beginning of the game name，Later changed《Aiso》，Display in the purchase《Karo》Namely《Aiso》


Game Update

《Aiso》 2018.1.11 Update: 1 Added a detailed description of the game operation


About the Game

《Aiso》It's a ACT + RPG 3D game, In the near future, a large number of transparent objects attacked the earth, The last in life has succeeded in creating the power to rival these transparent objects Ci, That is our protagonist counterattack, And with the human gene, Look for opportunities to re-create the story of mankind Introduction to play: The beginning, Our protagonist came to the mother star of a transparent object Players control our protagonist, Among W S A D move, J K attack, L Flash move, J K combination attack can be carried out, combination attack and L Flash move Is the focus of the fight, By changing their location L teleport plus combined attacks triggered invincible before you have a chance to survive Each area represents a different environment, After all the enemies in the region are all destroyed, can go into the next area to continue to attack Game depth story: Who made these transparent objects? And how long did the maker live? The story after the game double how? everything, It's up to you to decide
about_the_game:
《Aiso》It's a ACT + RPG 3D game, In the near future, a large number of transparent objects attacked the earth, The last in life has succeeded in creating the power to
rival these transparent objects Ci, That is our protagonist counterattack, And with the human gene, Look for opportunities to re-create the story of mankind

Introduction to play:

The beginning, Our protagonist came to the mother star of a transparent object

Players control our protagonist, Among W S A D move, J K attack, L Flash move, J K combination attack can be carried out, combination attack and L Flash move Is the focus of the fight, By changing their location L teleport plus combined attacks triggered invincible before you have a chance to survive

Each area represents a different environment, After all the enemies in the region are all destroyed, can go into the next area to continue to attack

Game depth story:
Who made these transparent objects?
And how long did the maker live?
The story after the game double how?
everything, It's up to you to decide
short_description: 《Aiso》It's a ACT + RPG 3D game, In the near future, a large number of transparent objects attacked the earth, The last in life has succeeded in creating the power to rival these transparent objects  Ci, That is our protagonist counterattack, And with the human gene, Look for opportunities to re-create the story of mankind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
